name: Lucy's Dreams
description:
Agressive trip-runner about desperate man who go on his last trip to make impossible dream come true. Drive through the night, knock down the obstacles and get to the end of the level alive for what it costs.

It's a demo-version, full game will be released in 2022. Now it contains only 3/8 levels.

Game was created specifically for Android, please play it on your movile device if you can. Web-build is only for informational purposes only, although it is fully playable.

If web-version is looking very low-res, turn on and off fullscreen.

Warning: contains flashy image and scenes of destructive behavior. You can turn off all glitches in the graphics settings menu. Also, english is my second language, I'm sorry for if english localization is not good enough.

Web-build input:
Arrow keys to move, all other input with mouse

Credits:

Made by: CORRUPTOR2037

In-game music by: Donbor

Main menu music by: An00bis
